name: Countering the Odds
description:
Countering the Odds is a short, interactive story about the necessity of counterspaces on college campuses. Players follow Riley - a student of color on a mostly-white college campus - as they navigate personal and social challenges in an effort to counter the odds.

Created by Alex Garbus, Lucas M., and Michael Miller for LSP 200 - Multiculturalism Seminar at DePaul University.
